splash.page_desc: Create your profile and share the link with anyone. No need to share individual account links, simply create your profile using our app and share only one link. Easily add social or other accounts to your profile.
splash.feature_1_subtitle: While creating your profile in our app, you can add links to all your social accounts or any other accounts, and instead of sharing multiple links, you can share a single link of our profile that encompasses all.
splash.feature_2_subtitle: Once the profile link is generated, you can use it extensively for various purposes, such as for your business, Youtube channel , and for your professional profile.
splash.feature_3_subtitle: When you create your profile using our app, we generate a short profile link for you, which you can easily share anywhere.
splash.feature_4_subtitle: The main profile can't be deleted, but you can customize its content or change account privacy at any time. On the other hand, the clone profile can be deleted anytime but can't change its content or its account privacy. In the clone profile, all accounts are always visible to other users.
splash.contact_us_desc: We're here to help! Send us your query via the contact or email below for any issues you're facing.
splash.download_app_desc: Streamline your social media experience with our app! Easily connect and manage all your social media accounts links in one place. Share your content effortlessly with a single link. Download now!! Available for Android.
splash.faq_subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers! Check out our FAQ section for quick solutions to common queries.

faq_1_ans: EaseLinked is an application that allows users to create a centralized profile containing links to all their social media and other accounts. Instead of sharing multiple links individually, users can share a single EaseLinked profile link.
faq_2_que: How do I create my EaseLinked profile?
faq_2_ans: To create your EaseLinked profile, simply download the app, sign up, and start adding your social media and other account links. Once your profile is created, you'll receive a unique EaseLinked profile link.
faq_3_que: What types of accounts can I add to my EaseLinked profile?
faq_3_ans: You can add links to various types of accounts, including social media accounts (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter), professional profiles (e.g., LinkedIn), business websites, YouTube channels, and more.
faq_4_que: Can I customize the content of my EaseLinked profile?
faq_4_ans: Yes, you can customize the content of your main EaseLinked profile by adding, removing, or rearranging the links to your accounts. However, please note that the main profile cannot be deleted.
faq_5_que: What is a Clone profile, and how does it differ from the main profile?
faq_5_ans: A Clone profile is a duplicate of your main EaseLinked profile. While the main profile cannot be deleted, you can delete a Clone profile at any time. However, you cannot change the content or privacy settings of a Clone profile.
faq_6_que: How do I share my EaseLinked profile link with others?
faq_6_ans: You can share your EaseLinked profile link via messaging apps, email, social media platforms, or any other communication channels. Simply copy the link from your profile and share it with others.
faq_7_que: Is my EaseLinked profile link permanent?
faq_7_ans: Yes, your EaseLinked profile link is permanent and can be used extensively for various purposes, such as personal branding, business promotion, or sharing your online presence with others.
faq_8_que: How do I generate a short link for my EaseLinked profile?
faq_8_ans: When you create your EaseLinked profile using our app, we automatically generate a short profile link for you. You can use this short link to easily share your profile on platforms with character limits, such as Twitter.
faq_9_que: What if I need help or have suggestions for EaseLinked?
faq_9_ans: If you need assistance or have any suggestions for improving EaseLinked, please reach out to our friendly support team at easelinked.support@gmail.com. We're here to assist you and welcome your feedback!
faq_10_que: Is EaseLinked available for both iOS and Android devices?
faq_10_ans: At the moment, EaseLinked is only available on the Android platform. We plan to expand our support to iOS in the future.
